Subscription.Description: Records the creation and modifications of scheduled tasks
Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <!-- The logs generated from Audit Other Object Access Events includes better scheduled task creation information than Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational --> <Query Id="0" Path="Security"> <Select Path="Security"> <!-- Scheduled task created, modified, deleted, disabled, enabled --> *[System[(EventID=4698 or EventID=4702 or EventID=4699 or EventID=4701 or EventID=4700)]] </Select>
<Suppress Path="Security"> *[EventData[Data[@Name='SubjectUserSid']='S-1-5-18']] or *[EventData[Data[@Name='SubjectUserSid']='S-1-5-19']] or *[EventData[Data[@Name='SubjectUserSid']='S-1-5-20']] </Suppress> </Query>
<!-- The default Task Scheduler events do not provide as much context, so this is disabled by default Event IDs: 106 = Task registered 140 = Task Modified 141 = Task registered 142 = Task disabled
<Query Id="1" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational">*[System[(EventID=106 or EventID=141 or EventID=142)]]</Select> </Query>
<Query Id="2" Path="Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-TaskScheduler/Operational">*[System[(EventID=140)]] and *[EventData[Data[@Name='UserName'] != 'NT AUTHORITY\System' and Data[@Name='UserName'] != 'System' and Data[@Name='TaskName'] != '\Microsoft\Windows\SoftwareProtectionPlatform\SvcRestartTask']]</Select> </Query> -->
</QueryList>
